backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage with access‑controlled queries and updates using AccessControl and a Principal‑keyed map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for authentication session behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and theme utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with routing, theme providers, Internet Identity context, React Query, and layout shell.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: Implements local demo account creation, storage, and password-based credential verification using localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and results returned by credential creation and verification functions.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Manages local session persistence, validation, expiration, and clearing for non‑Internet‑Identity authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Implements deterministic command parsing for navigation, help, greetings, and Flutter-related warnings.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Renders the voice assistant UI with transcript display, input handling, speech recognition, and text‑to‑speech features.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Handles saving, loading, and clearing assistant transcripts in localStorage.
Defines types for assistant messages, state, and command interpretation results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Provides the assistant drawer widget, manages transcript state, handles commands, navigation, and persistence.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: Custom hook for browser speech recognition with transcript, interim updates, and error handling.
Custom hook for text‑to‑speech with enable toggling and speech control.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Displays a section header with title, optional caption, and optional action element.
Reusable dashboard tile component with icon, label, value, and interactive variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Wrapper component providing card-like surfaces with variant styling.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Defines styled typography components (titles, body, captions) using tailwind classes and a cn utility.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: Provides a toggle switch to change between default and Design B themes via context.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Exports a demo user profile generated with a fixed seed and defines its TypeScript shape.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Defines the main layout shell with header, navigation, footer, and conditional user display and assistant widget.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Implements two bottom navigation tabs (Home, Profile) with active-state styling and routing.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Loads and saves the selected theme to localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme config and functions to apply or remove the theme via DOM attributes.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Provides context for managing and persisting the current design theme with a provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Manages local auth session actions for OTP, password, and guest modes using session helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements a demo OTP generator/validator with expiration, resend cooldown, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity integration, managing login state, stored identities, and exposing auth context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines example backend queries and a user profile query that depends on the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects authenticated users away from public pages to /home based on Internet Identity or local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Route guard hook redirecting unauthenticated users to /signin using Internet Identity or local session checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Resolves the current user's display name using profile data, local sessions, or Internet Identity with a fallback order.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, and light/dark theme CSS variables with design theme overrides.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Provides a seeded random generator and utilities for generating deterministic fake user profile data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper that merges Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDetails.ts: Placeholder for the appointment details page.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorList.tsx: Placeholder for the doctor list page.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's health dashboard with metrics, quick logs, and UI tiles.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Displays and edits authenticated user profile data with validation and sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Implements OTP, password, and Internet Identity sign‑in flows with form handling and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Sign-up page with form validation, account creation via local demo store, and navigation after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page with hero content offering sign-in or guest access, redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages saving, loading, and clearing profile data in localStorage based on the current session type.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines the ProfileDetails structure, provides empty defaults, and checks if any profile data exists.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates profile fields including name, email, phone, and emergency contact, returning structured errors.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves profile data via backend for Internet Identity or localStorage for local sessions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings, extending themes and integrating several plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, listing existing features and a pending request related to persistent login sessions.
